projects.sectionDescription: Some of the projects I've worked on.

descriptions.sofia: A professional website I built for Sofia Varvakis, a psychotherapist from Brazil. It's built using React and Tailwind CSS.
descriptions.ga: A basic implementation of a genetic algorithm based on the Shakespeare Monkeys theory. It's done using Rails but the logic is pure JavaScript.
